paragraph: Harry spends another summer holiday with the Dursleys in mid- , and things have n't been that easy for him . Over the summer , Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley have forbidden him to talk to any of the neighbours out of fear of him exposing his magical abilities .

The separation from his magical supplies -LRB- e.g. his wand , his broomstick , spellbooks , etc. -RRB- have become a real problem for Harry , too , because his teachers at Hogwarts of Witchcraft and Wizardry have given him a lot of summer homework .

He has seized the opportunity to start it a week after his arrival home by sneaking some of his books upstairs and hiding them in his room while Petunia and Dudley go out to admire Vernon 's new company car .

None of Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley have noticed him studying magic every night since then , and Harry has been very careful to avoid trouble with them , for his aunt and uncle have already been in a bad mood with him due to a telephone call they got from their nephew 's best friend at Hogwarts , Ronald , about which Vernon has furiously confronted him , even though Harry does n't know how Ronald got their home number .
The incident must have simply made Ronald warn their other friend Hermione not to call , as Harry received no word from them afterwards .

The only improvement in his relationship to Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley that gets changed is that they have given him permission to let his pet snowy owl Hedwig out at night with a promise not to use her to send letter to Ronald or Hermione , since Vernon could n't take the screeching racket she makes while bored if she gets locked in her cage all the time .

On  July -LRB- Harry 's thirteenth birthday -RRB- , after midnight , Harry receives gifts and letters from Ronald , Hermione , and Rubeus , each wishing him a happy birthday and sending him a gift . According to Ronald , his dad , Arthur , won a Daily Prophet Prize Draw for seven hundred galleons and has used it to take Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley to Egypt to visit his eldest son , William , with the remainder being used to provide Ronald with a new wand to replace the one that was broken last year .
Harry also learns that Percy is entering his seventh year at Hogwarts and has been named Head Boy .
According to Hermione , she and her parents are currently spending the holiday in France .
Also , both Ronald and Hermione mention in Hogwarts they will be in London on the last week before term to pick up their school supplies and want Harry to join them .
Rubeus hints in his letter the book he sent Harry will come in handy next term but he wants the reason for it to be a surprise until the term starts .
Another letter from Minerva arrives , saying that third years are allowed to visit the village of Hogsmeade and that their guardian needs to sign the permission form in order for them to do so .
When Harry awakes the next morning , he goes downstairs hoping to watch TV .

Unfortunately for him , he finds his Vernon and Dudley already watching the news and sits down with them unnoticed as the channel 's anchorman is halfway through the report on word from the Prime out on the London streets of an escaped convict , Sirius , who Vernon comments looks like he came from an asylum rather than a prison . This is obviously because the mental state of Black 's gaunt face and elbow-length hair is almost like comparing him to Harry , who luckily feels well groomed .

The reporter then transitions to his report on the Ministry of Agriculture and Fisheries ' announcement without implying beforehand which prison or asylum Black has escaped from , much to Vernon 's confusion . Nonetheless , Vernon announces to Lestrange-Peverell-Riddle-Weasley-Malfoy-Roberts-Potter-Dursley that his sister , Marjorie `` Marge '' Dursley , is coming to visit for a week .
Harry agrees to behave normally during her visit , if his uncle will sign his permission form and has to send Hedwig to the Weasley for the week due to Marge not knowing that Harry is a wizard .
On the final night , when she calls his father , James , a lazy good for nothing drunk , Harry loses his temper and accidentally inflates her .
She explodes and Harry decides to take his school things and run away , fearing he will almost certainly be expelled from Hogwarts , after using magic outside school .
He reaches Magnolia and sees a black dog staring at him .
In his shock , Harry falls and the Knight , a triple-decker bus designed for wizard transportation , arrives . The dog vanishes and is nowhere in sight .
Harry meets the Knight 's conductor , Stanley and the driver , Ernest .
Harry departs on the Knight Bus to the The in London .

He learns from the Daily Prophet , Sirius , the same convict and a follower of Tom , broke out of Azkaban , the first person to ever do so . Sirius was imprisoned for murdering thirteen people with a single curse in  , right after Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra 's murder .

At the The , he meets the Minister for Magic , Cornelius , in person , though Harry has to pretend that he does n't know him since Harry and Ronald were technically breaking school rules during their previous school year when they saw him in Rubeus 's Hut .

After explaining that Marge has been restored to normal and her memory modified , to Harry 's surprise , Fudge does n't take any action against him stating that accidental uses of magic do n't count as violations of the Decree for the Reasonable Restriction of Underage Sorcery .

Fudge books a room for Harry , where he will stay for the rest of the summer , but refuses to sign Harry 's Hogsmeade permission slip . Harry spends the rest of the holidays in Diagon , purchasing his school things and making sure not to make any unnecessary purchases .
On the last day of the holidays , Harry meets up with Ronald , Hermione and the rest of the Weasley who are also staying at the The .
When Hermione decides to spend her birthday money on a magical pet , to Ronald 's displeasure , Hermione purchases a cat named Crookshanks , who harasses Ronald 's pet rat Scabbers .

At some point during the night , Harry overhears a conversation between Ronald 's parents , Arthur and Molly . From what he hears , he learns that when Tom met his downfall , Black lost everything , and is now trying to kill Harry . Harry realises that Cornelius let him off because he was relieved to find Harry alive . He is unconcerned about Black , doubting that the escapee could harm him at Hogwarts , with headmaster Albus around . The next day , shortly before he boards the Hogwarts , Arthur tried to warn him about Black and makes him promise not to go looking for Black no matter what he hears . Harry tells him that he already knows because he heard Mr and Mrs talking about it earlier . Harry is also confused and asks why he would go looking for somebody who wanted to kill him .
On the train , Harry , Ronald , and Hermione share a compartment with Professor Remus Lupin , the new Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher .
After several hours , the train stops and a sinister , cloaked figure enters .

It sucks the happiness out of Harry , who faints . The creature then approaches Harry , possibly to kiss him , until Remus drives it off with a spell . After Harry recovers , Remus hands him and the others some chocolate and explains that the creature was a Dementor , one of the Azkaban , and that they were searching the train for Sirius . At Hogwarts , Draco taunts Harry over his reaction to the Dementor . After getting inside , Minerva calls Harry and Hermione to her and takes them to her office . Once there , Minerva reveals that Remus had informed her by Owl of Harry 's adverse reaction to the Dementor and wants him looked at by Mary to see if he 's ill .
The matron confirms that he 's fine .
After Minerva 's business with Hermione is concluded , they return to the Great to find that they missed the sorting ceremony .
Albus announces the two changes in staffing during the year : Remus , and Rubeus , who has been made the Care of Magical Creatures teacher due to the retirement of Silvanus .

Albus also announces that Dementors are to be stationed around the school as a precaution against Black . Lessons start the next day . Harry , Ronald and Hermione head to the North for their first Divination lesson .
They meet Sybill and predict future events using tea leaves .

Harry sees a black dog in his tea cup , which Trelawney identifies as the Grim , the omen of death . This worries Harry , as he remembers the black dog he saw when he ran away . In their next lesson , Transfiguration , Minerva assures Harry that Trelawney has predicted the deaths of a number of students , none of whom have died . In their Care of Magical Creatures lesson , Rubeus teaches them about hippogriffs -LRB- horse/eagle creatures -RRB- .

Although initially nervous , Harry successfully approaches and rides a grey hippogriff named Buckbeak . Later in the lesson , Malfoy , who had not been listening to Rubeus 's lecture , insults Buckbeak , causing it to slash Rubeus 's arm with its talons . Rubeus is taken to the hospital wing , and Rubeus fears that Rubeus will take the blame for letting Buckbeak attack Malfoy , even though Malfoy provoked it in the first place . Harry and Rubeus 's friends offer to help Rubeus clear Buckbeak .
This makes Rubeus sober up and finally notice that Harry 's there . Rubeus angrily tells Harry off for leaving the castle after dark and escorts the trio back to Gryffindor personally .
Later in Ageing-Polyjuice-Wolfsbane , Malfoy returns with a heavily bandaged arm .
Although it is implied that he is exaggerating the seriousness of the injury , there is no way to prove it .
Harry learns that Black has been sighted near Hogwarts . During the lesson , Malfoy hints that Black may be connected to Harry 's past .

In Defence against the Dark Arts , Remus teaches the third years about Boggarts , shape-shifters that take the shape of a person 's worst fear . The class then take on the Boggart , forcing it to assume a shape they find amusing . When it comes to Harry 's turn he is sure the Boggart will turn into a Dementor but Remus jumps in and repels the Boggart for him . Faced by Remus , the Boggart takes the shape of a bright glowing orb . Harry is disappointed that Lupin does not let him fight the Boggart , thinking that Remus feels he is not up to the task .
In October , the Gryffindor team practises hard for the upcoming Quidditch season , especially since this is their team captain Oliver 's final year at Hogwarts .
Oliver believes that despite the misfortune which occurred during the previous two years their team should be able to win the Quidditch before Oliver graduates .
Third years are also visiting Hogsmeade on Hallowe'en , and only Harry is not allowed , because Oliver 's uncle did not sign Oliver 's permission form .
Harry spends the day in Remus 's office , drinking tea with Oliver . Remus tells Oliver that Oliver did not let Harry face the Boggart because Oliver did not want the Boggart to become Tom .
Shortly afterwards , Snape appears with a mysterious potion for Remus .
Remus claims to simply have an illness that is aided by the potion .
A few hours later , Ronald and Hermione return .
They reach the portrait of the The and see it slashed and that the The is gone .
Peeves reveals that he saw her fleeing through another portrait after Sirius attacked her for not letting him into Gryffindor . Albus , Argus , and Percy seek her out .
Every student is moved in the Great to sleep while teachers search the castle .
They fail to find any sign of Black , and Snape suggests that someone inside the castle helped Black gain entry .
Albus refutes this argument .
Nobody talks about anything but Sirius for the next few days .
The The refuses to return to work until Black is caught .
Because of this , Albus is forced to replace her with Walden the Mad Knight .

Nobody is happy about this both because he changes the password twice a day and because he 's for the most part annoying but there 's nothing they can do because none of the other pictures wanted the job because of what happened to the The .

Meanwhile , because of the attack , an annoyed Harry gets place under surveillance : Teachers find excuses to go down the halls with him , Percy , acting on his mother 's orders , follows him everywhere like a guard dog .

Minerva decides to reveal the truth to Harry but Harry reveals he already knows Black 's after him . Minerva explains that 's why she does n't want him practising Quidditch in the evenings but Harry states he 's got to train .
Minerva agrees and decides to ask Mary to be present .
Gryffindor 's first Quidditch match is coming up , but due to Malfoy 's injury , Slytherin can not play .
Gryffindor plays Hufflepuff instead .
On the day before the match , Remus becomes ill and Severus teaches his classes for him .
Oddly , he ignores Remus 's syllabus and instead gives a lesson on werewolves and assigns the class to write an essay on werewolves .

During the match , it is raining badly and Harry sees a large black dog resembling the Grim in the topmost empty row of seats in the Quidditch stadium . Dementors enter the match causing Harry to faint and fall from his broomstick .

Harry realises that the screaming he had been hearing during his Dementor-induced fainting spells is his mother in her last moments . Albus saves Harry , but his Nimbus  broomstick flies into the Whomping and is destroyed .
Hufflepuff win the match shortly afterwards .
After the match , Harry wakes up in the Hospital Wing and learns what happened , including that Oliver has declined Hufflepuff captain Cedric 's offer for a rematch .
Alarmed by the adverse effects Dementor have on him , Mary insists that Harry stay in the hospital wing for the rest of the weekend .
The following week , Remus is back teaching class and states that the class does n't have to write the essay Severus assigned for them , though Hermione has finished hers .
After class , Harry goes to Remus wondering why Dementor affect him so much .

Remus explains that Dementors are fear itself and they pull forth the horrors from a person 's past , which is why just before he faints , Harry hears his mother screaming before she dies and why Dementor affect him worse than anyone else . Harry asks Remus if he can give him private lessons on the spell to drive off Dementors in case another one arrives at a Quidditch match .
Remus says he will , but after the Christmas holidays , citing his frequent illness .

Hufflepuff is defeated by Ravenclaw in their next Quidditch match , which gives the Gryffindor team a chance in the running for the Quidditch . Harry , who uses an old school broom in training sessions , is busy looking to obtain a new broomstick for himself so Gryffindor can stand a chance in their remaining matches .
During the last weekend before the holidays , while the eligible students visit Hogsmeade , Harry is yet again not able to go .
To bring some Christmas cheer to Harry , Fred and George reveal they know secret passages in and out of Hogwarts .
They give Harry the Marauder 's Map as a Christmas present and instruct him on how to use it .
It shows Hogwarts ' secret passages , corridors , classrooms , offices , common rooms , etc. , as well as every person 's location within the castle and the grounds .
Harry uses the Marauder 's Map to sneak into Hogsmeade . He then meets Ronald and Hermione in Honeydukes , where they were discussing what kind of sweets to get Harry .
They visit Broomstick , a pub run by Mary .
When Cornelius , Minerva , Filius , and Rubeus arrive , Harry hides underneath their table to avoid being seen .

The trio overhears a conversation between the group and Mary , in which they discuss how Sirius is a close childhood friend of Harry 's father , James , and that he is Harry 's godfather . The group goes on to talk about Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra learned how Tom had marked them for death by Albus , who had been tipped off by a spy . Albus had advised them to go into hiding using the Fidelius Charm , a concealment charm so powerful it can only be broken if the Secret Keeper , the person the spell is bound to , reveals it to the person the witch or wizard does n't want to be found by . James insisted on using Sirius despite Albus offering to be his family 's Secret Keeper due to fearing that a friend of Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra 's had turned traitor and joined Tom as a spy because he trusted Black beyond all his other friends . One week later , Black sold out Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra to Tom , who met his downfall in Harry . Ths forced Black to run for it . Peter , another of James 's friends , confronted Black for the betrayal and James and twelve Muggles were killed by Black with a single curse . Black was taken to Azkaban afterwards . It 's also revealed that Black is n't affected by the Dementors at all . After they leave , Ronald and Hermione stare at a devastated Harry . Harry is depressed both about the truth about Sirius and that no one bothered to tell him before .

Harry is also continuing to have nightmares about Dementors and his mother screaming . During the start of the holidays , Ronald and Hermione try to console Harry but Harry chooses to go to Rubeus 's house to ask him about Sirius despite Ronald and Hermione 's protests . When the trio arrives at his house , they find him distraught about Buckbeak 's upcoming hearing before the Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures , and Harry decides it is better not to bring Sirius up .
Rubeus reveals that he had a horrible experience with Dementor during his brief time in Azkaban .
He ca n't set Buckbeak free without the risk of being sent back there .
The trio then decides to help Rubeus prepare his defence for Buckbeak 's case .
For Christmas , among his other presents , Harry receives the best model broomstick ever released : the Firebolt .

Hermione is not happy when she learns that it came without a note , and is driven out of Harry and Ronald 's dormitory after Crookshanks attacks Peter again . During Christmas dinner , Hermione reports the mystery gift to Minerva , who sends it away to have it tested for tampering . Both Hermione and Minerva suspect Black might have sent the broomstick and that it could be jinxed .
Harry ceases speaking with Hermione , even though he knew she had good intentions with reporting the Firebolt .
Ronald is also no longer on speaking terms with Hermione because Crookshanks has been attacking Peter non-stop .
Meanwhile , Harry starts his lessons with Lupin . Remus tells Harry that Dementor is called the Patronus Charm , instructs him in how to cast one , and lets him practise on a Boggart .
Harry fails to produce a Patronus at first . This , however , is to be expected ; the Patronus Charm is well beyond O.W.L. standard .
During his first lesson , Harry learns that Remus was a friend of his father James back during their days at Hogwarts , and also knew Sirius as well .
In January , Slytherin beats Ravenclaw in their Quidditch match .
Gryffindor 's chances of getting the Quidditch are good , as long as they do n't lose in their own match against Ravenclaw .
By February , Harry becomes quite good at producing a Patronus after a few lessons , but does n't master it entirely .

At the end of a lesson , Remus explains the concept of a Dementor 's Kiss and reveals that it will be Black 's punishment , as an article in the Daily Prophet confirmed that the Ministry gave the Dementors permission to use the Kiss on Black when they find him .
While thinking about the horror of the punishment , Harry runs into Minerva on his way back to Gryffindor .
Minerva gives Harry back the Firebolt , which has been proven not to be jinxed , and suggests that he practise with it before the match .
Harry meets up with Ronald and they decide to go make up with Hermione .

Outside Gryffindor , they bump into Neville who 's in trouble because he lost a list . After the pair let him in , Neville tells Harry and Ronald that he made a list of the passwords for Gryffindor because Walden is still changing them twice a day but somehow they got lost .
Harry attempts to patch things up with Hermione but Peter disappears after they arrive at Gryffindor , ruining any chance for Ronald and Hermione 's reconciliation .
As March arrives , a new Quidditch match approaches : Gryffindor vs. Ravenclaw .
Harry spends the last practise session before the match getting used to his Firebolt .
During the game , just as Harry is about to catch the Golden , Cho , a fourth year Seeker for the Ravenclaw team , screams .
Harry looks around and sees three Dementors in the stands .
He reacts instantly , sending a full-fledged Patronus at Dementor .

Harry catches the Golden before Cho , winning the match . Lupin compliments Harry on his Patronus and shows Harry that the `` Dementors '' were really Draco , Vincent , Gregory , and Marcus , the Slytherin team captain , trying to sabotage Harry .

A furious Minerva takes fifty points away from Slytherin and sentences all four of them to detention as punishment . Godric-Gryffindor-Sword celebrate until Professor Mcgonagall tells them to go to bed .
But Ronald still refuses to reconcile with Hermione

That night , Ronald wakes up to Sirius slashing his bed curtains in the boys ' dormitory . Everyone thinks it might be a nightmare but the curtains are indeed ripped and Walden proves Ronald right beyond any reasonable doubt when he happily admits he let Sirius into Gryffindor .
Black apparently had the whole week 's passwords on a piece of paper . A furious Minerva demands to know who wrote down the passwords and lost them , to which Neville admits to being the perp .
Another search of the castle takes place , but Black evades capture again .
Tighter security is put in place : Professor Flitwick is teaching the doors to recognise Sirius while Argus boards up everything Black can use to sneak in except the passageway into Hogsmeade .
Walden is fired and the Fat Lady resumes her duty guarding Gryffindor on the condition her portrait is to be guarded .
Ronald becomes an instant celebrity , which he enjoys .

Neville , on the other hand , is in complete disgrace : Minerva is so furious with him that she strips him of his visitation rights to Hogsmeade for the rest of the school year , gives him a detention and forbids Godric-Gryffindor-Sword to tell him the password .
His grandmother , Augusta , sends him a Howler two days later .
Rubeus sends a letter to Harry , telling him that he and Ronald are to meet him in the entrance hall so he can take them to his hut for tea .
Other than learning that Buckbeak 's trial is that week , Harry and Ronald learn that Rubeus wants to talk to them on behalf of Hermione .
Rubeus mentions their feud has been hurting Hermione more than they think , and that she is only concerned about protecting Harry from Sirius .

Despite Rubeus 's advice , Ronald 's anger reignites when Hermione threatens to tell Minerva about the Marauder 's Map , which Harry plans to use to sneak into Hogsmeade during the upcoming trip that Saturday .

While on the trip that weekend , Harry using his Invisibility Cloak to make a few stops with Ronald before visiting the Shrieking , a house that is supposedly filled with violent ghosts . Malfoy , Vincent and Gregory show up there and provoke Ronald .
Harry , using his cloak , attacks the trio and Malfoy catches a glimpse of Harry 's head . Malfoy later reports the incident to Severus , who interrogates Harry after he returns from Hogsmeade .

Severus finds the Marauder 's Map , but is not able to discover what it does and is instead bombarded by insults from the map 's makers . Remus is summoned and claims ignorance about the map , and Ronald shows up to and claims the map is a Zonko product that insults anyone who touches it . Afterwards , Remus brings Harry and Ronald to the entrance hall , where he confiscates the map and reprimands Harry for not handing in something that could aid in Black 's capture .
He also scolds him for risking his life to sneak into Hogsmeade , thus undervaluing his parent 's sacrifice .
On their way back to Gryffindor , Harry and Ronald find Hermione , who informs them that the Ministry has decided to execute Buckbeak despite the help she provided for Buckbeak 's defence .
Buckbeak 's impending execution causes the friends to reconcile .
Ronald promises to help Hermione work on filing an appeal for Buckbeak 's case , since Harry will be too busy with Quidditch practise sessions for the final match .
After Malfoy mocks Rubeus during one of his classes , Hermione smacks him in the face .
She then accidentally skips Charms .
In Divination , Hermione finally explodes and drops the class .
In May , the Quidditch final takes place : Gryffindor vs. Slytherin .
Gryffindor needs to be more than fifty points ahead before Harry can catch the Golden in order to win the Quidditch .
On the morning of the match , Harry catches another glimpse of the dog , this time with Crookshanks .
In the match , Gryffindor take an early lead , and Slytherin resorts to cheating .
This helps the Gryffindor team to gain penalty shots and get further ahead .
Harry manages to catch the snitch at the right moment , allowing Gryffindor to come in first in the overall points and win the Quidditch at last .
The students take their end-of-year exams in June .
Buckbeak 's appeal is scheduled on the final day of the exams .
After Harry 's Divination final , Trelawney issues a genuine prediction that Tom 's servant will return to him that night and Tom will once again rise to full power stronger than before .
Meanwhile , Buckbeak 's appeal fails .

That night , after Hermione retrieves Harry 's Invisibility from the one-eyed witch 's hump -LRB- where Rubeus hid it after Malfoy spotted Rubeus in Hogsmeade -RRB- , Harry , Ronald , and Hermione use the cloak to go to Rubeus 's cabin to console him before Buckbeak is executed . Hermione finds Peter in a milk jug and returns him to Ronald .
After the trio depart , Albus , Cornelius , a representative of the Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures , and the executioner , Walden , arrive .
Buckbeak is then apparently executed . Shortly afterwards , Scabbers escapes from Ronald 's grasp .

Harry , Ronald and Hermione run after him and spot the black dog and Crookshanks . After Ronald catches Peter , the dog grabs Ronald by the arm and pulls him in a passage under the Whomping , breaking his leg in the process .

Harry , Hermione , and Crookshanks follow after them . The passage leads them to the Shrieking , where they find Ronald , Peter , and Sirius . Black turns out to be an unregistered Animagus whose animal form is a black dog ; he was the one who dragged Ronald down into the Shrieking . Harry manages to overpower and subdue Black , who admits that he is responsible for the death of his parents . Lupin then arrives and is accused by Hermione of being Black 's accomplice and a werewolf .
Hermione deduced this following Severus 's lesson on werewolves , since Remus was always absent on nights of the full moon and Lupin 's Boggart turned into the moon .
Remus admits that he is a werewolf , but denies the charge of helping Black .

He explains that he found out where Harry , Ronald and Hermione went through the Marauder 's Map , since he had helped to create it and knew that the three of them would visit Rubeus that night due to Buckbeak 's execution .

He also adds that he saw a supposedly dead person on the map with the trio ; Peter , who is also an Animagus and had been living for years as Peter . Harry , Ronald and Hermione refuse to believe that Pettigrew is alive , pointing out that he was murdered by Black .
Black denies this , and Remus convinces him to tell Harry the truth of what happened .

Remus tells the story about his time at Hogwarts ; he had been bitten as a child , and Albus took precautions for his stay at Hogwarts , having the Shrieking and the passage leading to it built to provide Lupin with a safe place to transform .
The Whomping was planted on the entrance to the tunnel to prevent anyone from running into the transformed Remus .

The rumours that the Hogsmeade residents started about the Shack being haunted by violent ghosts were allowed to spread to keep people from guessing that it was actually a werewolf making those sounds .
Eventually , Remus 's friends , Sirius , Pettigrew and James , discovered Remus 's secret , and became Animagi to support him .
Sirius became a dog to keep Remus under control with James , and Pettigrew became a rat so he could disable the Willow by scurrying under its branches and touching a certain spot on its trunk .
Remus admits that he has not told Dumbledore about Sirius being an Animagus , as it would have meant admitting that he had betrayed his trust and led three students into illegally becoming Animagi .

He also reveals the reason for Severus 's animosity towards him during the year : during their days at school , Sirius had played a near-fatal trick on Severus involving Remus in his transformed form but James saved him .
Severus thought both of them were involved with Sirius ' trick .
Just then , Severus arrives using Harry 's Invisibility , which he had left at the foot of the Whomping .
Severus arrives and tries to arrest Remus and Black , but Harry , Ronald , and Hermione , curious to hear the rest of the story , stun Snape .
Sirius reveals he broke out of Azkaban after seeing the Weasley in Egypt in the Daily Prophet .
He saw Peter and immediately recognised it was Pettigrew in his Animagus form -LRB- Pettigrew was missing a finger , Peter was missing a toe -RRB- .
He searched for Pettigrew to kill him and avenge Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra ; Crookshanks helped , since he could tell that Peter was no rat and Black was no dog .
Sirius explains after he gained Crookshanks ' trust , Crookshanks helped him get into Gryffindor by stealing Neville 's list of passwords .
According to Black , Pettigrew was Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra 's Secret-Keeper .Peter , not Black , revealed the location of Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra 's hiding place to Tom .
He was a spy for Tom .

After Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra 's murder , Sirius confronted Pettigrew , who killed the twelve Muggles and faked his own death by cutting his finger and turning into a rat and escaping , thus framing Black for the crimes .
Sirius was innocent all along and means no harm to Harry , Ronald , and Hermione .
Black and Lupin force Scabbers to turn into Pettigrew .
During their interrogation , Sirius explains the obvious reason why Pettigrew remained as a rat : he was afraid that Tom 's followers would try to kill him , thinking Pettigrew betrayed Tom .
Black also knows that Pettigrew only stayed with the Weasley to keep up on the news until he felt it was safe to find and rejoin his master .
Hermione asks how Sirius escaped .
He reveals that the knowledge that he was innocent kept him sane : it was not a happy thought , so Dementor could not drain it from him .
He also often transformed into a dog , since Dementors can not affect animal emotions .

After learning where Pettigrew was and knowing Pettigrew would use the opportunity to capture Harry and regain favour with his allies , Black escaped while in his Animagus form . At long last , Harry believes Black .

Pettigrew admits it 's all true and begs for mercy . Before Remus and Sirius can kill Pettigrew , Harry stops them , saying that James would not want his two best friends to become killers . The group takes Pettigrew back to Dementor . Sirius and Harry talk about the former 's friendship with Harry-James-Campaign-Ginevra , including that Sirius is Harry 's godfather . Sirius tells Harry that he can choose to live with him if he wishes . Harry quickly and happily agrees , knowing this would mean he would never have to Marjorie-Petunia-Vernon-Dudley .
Unfortunately , the full moon rises , causing Remus , who had not taken his Wolfsbane , to turn into a werewolf .
This allows Pettigrew to knock Ronald out , turn into a rat , and escape .
Harry and Hermione run after Remus and Black -LRB- who has transformed into a dog -RRB- . After seriously injuring Black , Remus flees to the Forbidden .
A hundred Dementors arrive and suck the happiness from Harry , Hermione , and Black and attempt to perform a Kiss on them .

Before they all faint , Harry sees a familiar figure across the lake conjure a powerful stag-shaped Patronus that drives Dementor away . Harry , Hermione , and Ronald are taken to the Hospital Wing , and Black is taken to West , where he is sentenced to a Dementor 's Kiss . When Albus arrives , Harry and Hermione try to tell him what actually happened , but Albus tells them that Albus can not save Black , as the evidence against Albus is too great .
Severus had lied about what happened earlier to Cornelius , and the Minister will not take the words of under-age students seriously .
Albus gives the group cryptic instructions and bids them good luck .
Hermione then reveals she has a Time-Turner , a device that will take them back through time .

Minerva gave the device to her during the Sorting on their first day back ; this explains why throughout the year , there had been occasions of Hermione taking multiple classes at the same time and apparently disappearing into thin air .
Harry and Hermione travel three hours into the past , watching themselves move through previous events .

They realise that Albus wanted them to travel three hours back to not only save Buckbeak from being wrongfully executed , but also to use Buckbeak to free Black from West . After narrowly rescuing Buckbeak at the right moment before Walden can execute him -LRB- so Albus and Rubeus would not be accused of setting Buckbeak free -RRB- , Harry and Hermione hide near the Whomping in the Forbidden to wait for the `` other Harry and Hermione '' and everyone else to return from the Shrieking . During this time , Harry tells Hermione about the man he saw across the lake and how he thinks it was his father who conjured the Patronus . After two hours , following Remus 's transformation , Harry decides they need to head back to Rubeus 's empty cabin so Remus does n't attack them . After spending some time in hiding , Harry leaves the cabin to check out the present situation and sees himself , Hermione , and Black fainting from Dementors . He realises that the silver stag he saw earlier across the lake was not cast by his dad and conjures a powerful Patronus that drives Dementor away . When it returns to him , he pets it and realises that it was the same Patronus as `` James , '' his father . After Hermione and Buckbeak catch up , they wait until they see Walden leave the castle to retrieve Dementor . He and Hermione then fly Buckbeak up to West and rescue Black .
Harry and Sirius say their goodbyes before Sirius flies away on Buckbeak .

Harry and Hermione make it back to the hospital wing just in time for Albus to magically lock the door . Shortly afterwards , Snape bursts in , followed by Cornelius and Albus , and accuses Harry of freeing Black .
Fudge assumes Severus is simply delirious because his chances of receiving the Order of Merlin have gone up in smoke .

Fudge leaves to inform the Daily Prophet of the news and agrees to remove Dementor from Hogwarts , since Dementor 's attempt to perform the Dementor 's Kiss on Harry proves them to be more harmful than helpful .

Shortly after they leave , Ronald wakes up from his unconscious state . The next day , while most of the other students are at Hogsmeade , the trio learns that Remus is resigning because Severus told the Slytherin house Remus 's secret . Harry goes to see Remus and is unable to sway Remus 's mind , since Remus does not want to risk endangering the students again .
Remus confirms Harry 's suspicions that James ' Animagus form was indeed a stag .
Lupin then gives Harry his Invisibility Cloak back , along with the Marauder 's Map , and leaves with Dumbledore to catch his carriage .

Later , while talking with Albus , Harry confesses that he feels bad for not letting Remus and Black kill Pettigrew , realising that he was the servant that would aid with Tom 's return from Trelawney 's prophecy . Albus reminds Harry that he saved Black , an innocent man , from a terrible fate .
Furthermore , Pettigrew owes a life debt to Harry for saving him , which Albus is sure will prove useful later on .
Before he leaves , Albus mentions that Harry has some of his father 's qualities , which is why his Patronus took the form of James .
At the end-of-the-year feast , Gryffindor wins both the Quidditch and the House Cup .
The students return to London aboard the Hogwarts .
Hermione mentions to Harry and Ronald that she gave up the Time-Turner because it caused her too much stress .
She has decided to drop Muggle Studies so she can have a normal schedule again .
Ronald announces that he is planning to invite Harry to the  , since his father can get them tickets from work . Ronald also has a telephone that he can use to contact Harry now .
A tiny owl from Black then arrives on the train with a letter .
In the letter , Black reveals that he is travelling far away from Hogwarts to avoid causing further problems and admits he bought Harry the Firebolt with Crookshanks ' help .
A separate section of the letter provides Harry with permission to visit Hogsmeade ; Harry knows Albus will accept it .
Sirius also mentions that the tiny owl is a gift for Ronald -LRB- later named Pigwidgeon by Ginevra -RRB- , since it is Black 's fault that Ronald no longer has a rat .
After arriving at King 's Cross , Ronald says Ronald will contact Harry about the finals of the  , and Harry heads back to Little Whinging with Vernon .
Harry is happy Ronald now has a true family member to depend on and mentions to Vernon that Ronald has a godfather who had escaped from wizard prison and likes to check up on Ronald .
